    Bio

    Thank you for visiting my website. I am currently pursuing my Master's in Computational Data Analytics at Georgia Institute of Technology. I completed my bachelor's in mechanical engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. With two years of research experience and four years of professional experience in data science roles, my most recent focus was on developing price and demand forecasting models for B2B enterprises. Over the past few years, I have enjoyed working on diverse problems like time series forecasting, optimization, computer vision, and natural language processing in manufacturing, retail, transportation, and pharmaceutical industries. I am also an avid researcher and have authored several machine learning publications in reputed conferences and journals. In my free time, you will find me playing and watching cricket.


    For more information, please check my CV.
